translations: v.拦截（intercept 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Intruders intercepting and accessing user input.
sentences.translation: 入侵者截获并访问用户输入。

sentences.sentence: Tampering involves someone intercepting a message and then changing it.
sentences.translation: 篡改包括某人拦截一条消息并更改它。

sentences.sentence: His skill at intercepting the ball earned him the title of the Eagle of Asia.
sentences.translation: 他精湛的截球技术为他赢得了“亚洲之鹰”的称号。
